### MaxStride {#a060aaa0369b0d353cec113e656ef9825}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::MemoryDepChecker::DepDistanceStrideAndSizeInfo::MaxStride</>}>
Strides could either be scaled (in bytes, taking the size of the underlying type into account), or unscaled (in indexing units; unscaled stride = scaled stride / size of underlying type).

Here, strides are unscaled.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-h/#l00374">374</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-h">LoopAccessAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
